column5: Yes! Yes! Definitely feel that way as well. I thought I’m the only one being weird.
Always try to convince myself into the state you described but deep down there is just resistance to this. Wish I knew why.......at least I’m making an effort
I’m feeling it right now because tomorrow or today I’m going to meet a friend who I just met once. I’m so anxious and so annoyed, can’t even fall asleep.
